sections.title: PhD Project
content: As a Ph.D. student at Aarhus University, Mojdeh is focused on exploring the epigenetic and nutritional risk factors for painful temporomandibular disorders.
Her research aims to identify potential risk factors and preventive measures for painful temporomandibular disorders.

sections.title: Additional Research
content: Association between Pre-adolescent Spinal Pain and Painful Temporomandibular Disorders in Young Adulthood
The results of this study have been presented at the IASP Conference 2024.
